channel.title: 280W的TR3 3990X瑟瑟发抖：10-core Comet Lake-S CPUs could draw up to 300W
channel.description: 280W的TR3 3990X瑟瑟发抖：10-core Comet Lake-S CPUs could draw up to 300W

item.title: 280W的TR3 3990X瑟瑟发抖：10-core Comet Lake-S CPUs could draw up to 300W[0-50]
item.description:
280W的TR3 3990X瑟瑟发抖：10-core Comet Lake-S CPUs could draw up to 300W 本帖最后由 Radeon 于 2020-1-9 22:40 编辑
https://videocardz.com/newz/intels-10-core-comet-lake-s-cpus-could-draw-up-to-300w
Several motherboard manufacturers revealed that the 10-core breaks the 300-watt mark at maximum load. Not surprisingly, the 9900KS already exceeded the 250-watt mark in scenarios of this kind. This information has nothing in common with the TDP, which is rumored to be 125 watts. Up to 4.9 GHz Turbo clock for all 20 threads on the flagship makes this value increase significantly in everyday life depending on the load.
几家主板制造商透露，该10核在最大负载时突破了300瓦大关。 毫不奇怪，在这种情况下，9900KS已经超过了250瓦大关。 该信息与TDP没有什么共同之处，有传闻称其为125瓦。 旗舰产品上所有20个线程的最高4.9 GHz Turbo时钟使该值在日常生活中根据负载而显着增加。
item.content:encoded:
Radeon:
280W的TR3 3990X瑟瑟发抖：10-core Comet Lake-S CPUs could draw up to 300W
本帖最后由 Radeon 于 2020-1-9 22:40 编辑
https://videocardz.com/newz/intels-10-core-comet-lake-s-cpus-could-draw-up-to-300w
Several motherboard manufacturers revealed that the 10-core breaks the 300-watt mark at maximum load. Not surprisingly, the 9900KS already exceeded the 250-watt mark in scenarios of this kind. This information has nothing in common with the TDP, which is rumored to be 125 watts. Up to 4.9 GHz Turbo clock for all 20 threads on the flagship makes this value increase significantly in everyday life depending on the load.
几家主板制造商透露，该10核在最大负载时突破了300瓦大关。 毫不奇怪，在这种情况下，9900KS已经超过了250瓦大关。 该信息与TDP没有什么共同之处，有传闻称其为125瓦。 旗舰产品上所有20个线程的最高4.9 GHz Turbo时钟使该值在日常生活中根据负载而显着增加。

雪影:
本帖最后由 雪影 于 2020-1-9 22:34 编辑

AMD：你IPC更低
intel：我5G
AMD：你更晚出
